fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Regolamentazione europea dei pagamenti elettronici (Regolamento 2015/751/UE, Direttiva 2015/2366/UE, EBA guidelines on strong customer authentication, 4 AMLD)
membership: Member of Advisory Board of CashlessWay (http://cashlessway.com/)
goals__remit: Siamo una boutique legale internazionale specializzata in regolamentazione dei pagamenti elettronici e diritto della concorrenza. Rappresentiamo società multinazionali leader del settore che operano secondo standard di eccellenza.
relevant_communication:
- EBA consultation on draft Guidelines on authorisation of payment and e-money institutions (dic 2016,  Payments & Fintech Lawyer) 
 
- Payment Cards and Permitted Multilateral Interchange Fees (MIFs): Will the European Commission Harm Consumers and the European Payment Industry? 
(nov 2014,  Oxford Journal of European Competition Law & Practice) 
- Draft Regulation on interchange fees: what's in it for consumers?(set 2013,  MLex Ab Extra)
